publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6143.1 Ted Brocklebank: Gaelic - An Action Plan for Gaelic—As an amendment to motion (S3M-6143) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, insert at end "and recommends that the Parliament and Bòrd na Gàidhlig pay close attention to the New Zealand Government’s successful initiatives to increase the numbers of Maori language speakers."
